name: Cryo Shield
description:
The character to which this is attached takes no DMG and cannot be Frozen.
This status will provide 2 instances of Cryo Application (Can be depleted using Elemental Reactions): Once the instances are depleted, this status will be removed, and will Stun the character to which this is attached.
descriptionraw: The character to which this is attached <color=#FFFFFFFF>takes no DMG</color> and cannot be Frozen.\nThis status will provide 2 instances of <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo Application</color> (Can be depleted using Elemental Reactions): Once the instances are depleted, this status will be removed, and will <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C100001]</color> the character to which this is attached.
descriptionreplaced: The character to which this is attached <color=#FFFFFFFF>takes no DMG</color> and cannot be Frozen.\nThis status will provide 2 instances of <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo Application</color> (Can be depleted using Elemental Reactions): Once the instances are depleted, this status will be removed, and will <color=#FFFFFFFF>Stun</color> the character to which this is attached.
